question:
Which of the following empires sustained the advancements of Arab invaders?
1) Karkotas of Kashmir
2) Gurjara Pratiharas of Kannauj
3) Bappa Rawal of Chittor
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Rajput chiefs did not allow the peaceful existence of Arabs. The Karkotas of Kashmir, the Gurjara Pratiharas of Kannauj and the renowned Bappa Rawal of Chittor were all-powerful enough to check the Arab advancement.
